column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=The Cost to Be Wise
#Text=Veronique stayed with me that night , lying next to me in my blankets and furs .
#Text=She did n't sleep , I do n't think .
#Text=I was listening to her breath .
#Text=I felt as if I should help her sleep .
#Text=I lay there and tried to think if I should put my arm around her , but I did n't know .
#Text=Maybe she did n't want to be touched .
#Text=And she had been a stupid girl , anyway .
#Text=She lay tense in the dark .
#Text=" I was reminiscing on a week - long night when I was woken by a pixie .

#Text=She laughed .
12-1	_	She	abstract[45]	new[45]	coref	13-3[45_46]
12-2	_	laughed	_	_	_	_
12-3	_	.	_	_	_	_

#Text= If I get out of here . "

column1: #Text=I waited for her to say more , but she did n't .
#Text=" Get out of here " meant to make someone leave .
#Text=Maybe she meant if she made herself .
#Text=" You come here from Earth ? " I asked .
#Text=To get her to talk , although I was tired of lingua and I did n't really want to think about anything .
#Text=" My family came here from Earth , " she said .
#Text=" Why ? "
#Text=" My father , he 's an anthropologist , " she said .
#Text=" Do you know anthropologist ? "
#Text=" No , " I said .
#Text=" He is a person who studies the way people live .

#Text= Because Earth had lost touch with your world , the people here are very interesting to my father , " she said .

column1: #Text=Her voice was listless in the dark and she was even harder to understand when I could n't see her properly .
#Text=I did n't understand so I did n't say anything .
#Text=I was sorry I 'd started her talking .
#Text=" History , do you know the word ' history ' ? " she asked .
#Text=Of course I knew the word " history . "
#Text=" I study history in school , " I said .
#Text=Anneal and Kumar taught it .
#Text=" Do you know the history of this world ? "
#Text=It took my tired head a long time to sort that out .
#Text=" Yes , " I said .
#Text=" We are a colony .
